Definition: to decline in strength or vigor
Example Sentance: Flagged at the end of the race, the runner's pace slowed significantly. (PrPP)

Definition: cheerful eagerness or readiness to respond
Example Sentance: The question was answered with alacrity because the child wanted the piece of candy.

Definition: to surrender; to give up or give in
Example Sentance: The general finally capitulated when all his forces were surrounded.
It was easy to understand the teacher because she gave ingenuous answers.
